real Patch::getValue ( size_t  i_field,
size_t  i 
) [inline]

This is one of the main methods which will be used for data exchange. How this can be used to handle exchange between CPU/GPU, CPU/CPU, GPU/GPU, and NODE/NODE (MPI) needs to be established as sooon as possible.

Todo:
look into different data exchange methods
Parameters:
i_fieldthe index of the field (e.g. rho, rhou, ...)
ithe spatial index (either cell or node)
Returns:
the value at the specified position
